package.name: Reserv
package.summary: Reserv, the New Layaway, is a digital layaway solution for modern e-Commerce. Drive conversion and revenue by offering your customers one more way to buy. Cut cost through automation and smart inventory management controls. Offer layaway on only the products that you select, set down payment minimums and plan duration maximums. Sell more to your existing customers and open up a new customer base for your products.
package.description:
Drive conversion and revenue with Reserv, the New Layaway. Reserv is a digital layaway solution built for modern e-Commerce. Situated as a payment option in the form of a button at your point of sale, Reserv gives your customers one more way to buy from you – particularly customers that are averse to or cannot access credit. Drive larger ticket and shopping cart sales with a responsible purchasing method. Reduce cart abandonment with a beautiful, intuitive layaway payment option.
Reserv equips merchants with the following features: select which inventory is available for layaway and which is not; optimize the maximum and minimum length of layaway plans; set down payment terms and monitor plan completion rates.
The process of setting up a Reserv layaway plan is as follows: the customer selects the item he or she would like to save up for, and adds it to their cart. The customer selects to fund the purchase with layaway by pushing the Reserv button. After syncing their bank account details, the customer sets up the term of the plan, including the plan name, length, and payment frequency (weeks or months). The customer inspects the details of the plan one last time before finalizing. After finalization, the customer is provided with a dashboard that allows them to monitor the progress of the Reserv plan.
Our team provides customer service until plans are completed, the merchant has been paid and the goods have been shipped to the customer. Our technical team is always standing by to help you work through any issues and add new features over time. An associate from Reserv will contact you after your download to help ensure a smooth integration.
package.notes: Welcome to Version 1 of Reserv. This is the first version of our Magento Extension and we hope it will enhance your customer's experience.
